metadata.name: AspNetCompiler Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "aspnet_compiler.exe" which can be abused to compile and execute C# code.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\microsoft.net\\framework\\')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('c:\\windows\\microsoft.net\\framework64\\'))) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\aspnet_compiler.exe')))

output.summary: Detects execution of "aspnet_compiler.exe" which can be abused to compile and execute C# code.
